Title: [ANN][Registration Live]CrowdShare Mining/LendingX2 Project[PRE-SALE 25-4-2018]
Body: WEBSITE :: WHITEPAPER :: FACEBOOK :: TWITTER :: TELEGRAM  Pre-sale is live now! 50% bonus token with limited token caps!! grab it now!   WHAT IS CROWDSHARE MINING? New-generation, Eco-friendly, CryptoMining operation, allowing you to purchasing profit share from us.  ABOUT CROWDSHARE CSM release tokens based on a real business concept. An ICO for people who think and believe like us where cryptocurrency mining is profitable and it a long run down the road. We have team of experts with years of mining exp and trading analyst. CSM provide you the service that save lots of your problems. Noise level,maintenance,rent,high electricity,24/7 monitor miners,miners heat discharge and etc. An ICO where we believe using mining as a backend long run passive income for holders before we imply lending system. Your investment will keep growing with our management and current plans.(review roadmap/whitepaper for better understanding) CSM token value will increase slow and steady over time.  BENEFITS  -FRAUD PROTECTED -OPERATION COSTS REDUCED -SAFE AND FAST -DECENTRALIZED DISPUTE SOLUTIONS -EASY GLOBAL PAYMENTS -EASY ENGAGEMENTS  OVERVIEW 1: As per phrase, 50% of funds target hit are used immediately on pre-order/purchasing the most profitable ASIC/gpu miners. It is to ensure payouts will be issued on time to our token holders. Payouts are issued after 3 months of active mining. 2: All miners will be powered by eco-friendly energy. We are doing our best to gain more profit for token holders and eventually let them feel we are worth investing in than other cloud mining site. We don’t sell hash rate power. 3: As a token holders, you will received payouts in ethereum/bitcoin every 3 months for as long as your token is held. Token holders are entitled to 50% proportional shares of the company’s net profits 4: Re-investing is the best way to grow. Token holders value and active mining profits are use to purchase more ASIC miners. 5: Everything we do are transparency. Token holders will received by email monthly of company’s expense and profit reports. Expense-purchases of miners/equipments/etc. Profit-Daily mining estimated profit graph. 6: We do have active team members for customers support/feedback on social media. Every movement/process are updated on fb for token holders to know. Any faqs/supports join us now on telegram channel/bitcointalk/twitter/fb or kindly email us.  OPERATING SUMMARY TOTAL 100% -50% Investor's profit share -25% Dividend reinvestment -15% Future development backup funds (Lending/Exchange/Marketplace) -7% Operating cost and maintenance -3% CSM Management  Token Distribution CrowdSale Public - 84% FOUNDER/CO-FOUNDERS TOKENS - 5% RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT - 5% CROWDSHARE TEAMS - 6%   Advantages  No cost on cooling system CS mining facility maintains of constant temp of 20c, a ideal mining environment for mining, a major cost savings for our operation  Cheap Electricity We operate with bulk purchase of eco friendly renewable energy in Asia. Efficiency and It enabling us to delivery more profits.  Cheap rent Our mining facility are location in Asia, we had negotiated rental of property as low as u are expecting. Huge area that allows us to even build our own solar farm in future.  Advisor Team An ICO with a group advisor team that is highly entrepreneurial and experienced in mining and traders.  Lifetime profit Our dividend are reinvested to more miners and future developments. We are able to compound returns and create more and more profit for investors. Thereby investors hold on to ownership.  An opportunity to gain multiples ways An ico which imply multiples way of creating passive dividend for investors. Author: khufuking
Title: [ANN][Registration Live]CrowdShare Mining/LendingX2 Project[PRE-SALE 25-4-2018]
Body: I like the idea , but you have couple of problems  .  - Isn't ICO based on mining at this times is not a good idea ! . The mining profitability is at its lowest since very very long time . How you plan to overcome this ! - The total amount from the profit to be distributed to users  is 75% ( 50% + 25% to be reinvest ) , there is 25% of the profit gone which I think will take away the low electricity and cheap operation with it . Let alone from this 75% only 50% will be give to investors . I do not understand why would anyone by tokens that will give him 50% profit while he can just order his equipment from amazon and start his own rig and make 100 % of the profit for him self . Can you please explain more what is the other benefits that will make anyone buy tokens and not buy his own rig , clearly the -25% not counted will be weighted with the cheap electricity and cheap operation ! .
